evidence.text: Person A: New Billy's got to make moves. Craig's here.

Person A: Gary, did you ever talk to her again after that time at The Please
Person B: You talked to her, too?

Person A: So we manufacture a random encounter where he can get her talking.
Person B: Not random - surprise encounter. I say we put a wire on Gary and we go now. I'm thinking you can just play this as just a concerned check-in.

Person A: You good?
Person B: Really? Does he need that?
Person B: Oh my god! Yeah! There he is. The man himself. I figured you’d be coming by here, man. C’mon, celebration beer?
